website_summaries.verdict: Remove the valve of this  thoughtfully-designed batter dispenser to streamline your cleanup.
pros: Dispensing trigger handle is easy to use
Wide opening lets you fill without making a mess
Valve is removable, making it simple to clean
Easy-to-read measurement markings for amounts up to 4 cups
cons: Dispenses thin batters well but many thick, homemade batters get stuck

customer_reviews.title: Buy the KPKitchen one instead
customer_reviews.text: I had used the model from KPKitchen for about 2 years until it wore out. We use it weekly. I saw that OXO now has a version and assumed it would be superior. It is not due to one design flaw. If you pull the handle a little too hard the whole thing falls off and dumps all the batter with no means to stop it. This is particularly hard for kids or other first time users. It takes a very light touch. The purple lid one from KPKitchen is cheaper, easier to use and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: I’m in a bad mood
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased Oxo products as they have been reliable. Not so with the batter dispenser. I had the worst mess while making pancakes. The batter just kept pouring. I haven’t called support as I don’t want to clean it and send it back. I want to throw it away which is what I am going to do promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not good execution
customer_reviews.text: Thus seems like a good product, but the spout is a silicone sleeve that is pinched closed when you stop squeezing the handle. It will get stuck closed, since it's flexible/pliable. Pancake batter would not go through it when it was open! The handle also seems to catch sometimes, so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Antisis

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work or was defective. The closing mechanism that regulated the batter onto the pan only worked when the product was flat against the pan (which you couldn’t do on a hot surface), and caused a huge mess all over our hot stove and kitchen floor for our Christmas breakfast. A very unpleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: James A Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Just so-so
customer_reviews.text: Probably works well with bought pancake batter, but I make my own and it is thicker, and tends to thicken up before I get through cooking. Worked OK for the first batch or two, but I had to spoon out the rest - batter too thick to run out the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rickenbaker

customer_reviews.title: Makes pancakes and waffles so much easier
customer_reviews.text: If you get your batter thin enough, this is the best way to dole it out for pancakes or waffles. The wide mouth makes it easy to get the batter in without spilling, and it's very easy to see how much you're dispensing each time. The only gripe I have is with the silicon spout on the bottom. I don't have confidence in its long-term durability, it seems like it's only going to be a matter of time before it starts to crack and leak. The main problem is that if you make a thick batter, the silicon doesn't let it flow through easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Elliot

customer_reviews.title: RETURN WINDOW IS SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I just used my gadget for the first time this weekend and it was an epic fail. The handle gets held back and you have to maneuver it back into place or else it gets stuck. I'm not sure if mine is defected or not. I came to my amazon account to return it only to find out that the return window had closed. I don't recommend buying this product. They don't stand behind their product if they give a small return window. I also only just used it for the first time and the spout wouldn't close.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It could be better
customer_reviews.text: I thought you were supposed to be able to mix the batter in this. I tried that and powder just started pouring out the bottom before batter. The other issue was that I pulled the lever too hard and the plug came out and batter just kept pouring out of the bottom. I wasted half of my batter because of this. Now that I know these issues it should be easier to use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Twins Times Two

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I though that for the price and the brand it would be good quality. The plastic is very cheap, at the mechanism for cuts off the flow is very flimsy and comes out often. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto A Elissetche

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality, cracked after 3 uses, plastic is weak so when the handle was engaged it cracked. This in turn caused it to be unusable. I emailed the manafacturer directly with no response. Can’t add pictures for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: molly mitton

customer_reviews.title: Economical , relieves frustrating messes , get one!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the all time best baking gadget that I have ever purchased!!! So easy to use & clean up!!!
customer_reviews.author: HMST

customer_reviews.title: Finally Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: After trying multiple dispensers we finally got one that works very well. Components are high quality and built to last. Finally satisfied! Thank you Oxo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I agree with a lot of the reviews
customer_reviews.text: This thing "broke" the first time I used it. If you pull all the way back on the handle, the piece that is SUPPOSED to close the funnel/dispensing part pops off the track and your batter pours out. There's no way to fix it without making a BIG mess. You can put it back on track, but the next time you pull the handle, it pops off again. I'm not going to send it back, I'm tossing it. Waste of a little money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Makes waffles and pancakes far less messy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill and use! I find that if you make your batter a little more runny that normal it will dispense out of this better.
customer_reviews.author: Brad M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son absolutely loves it He got it as a gift Works great
customer_reviews.author: minion

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for pancake batter and it worked amazingly! It only leaked like one drip in between cookings. So easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Sassysouth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. Easy to detatch and spill everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I click the handle back it comes out of place..wasted half my Keto pancake mix!! Keto pancake mix isn't cheap either. This is the 2nd one I have purchased..different brand..no better than the first that broke!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnea Mae Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Precisely dispenses batter
customer_reviews.text: This statement led me to believe that there was some kind of cut off after squeezing the handle. This means that the person pouring is still responsible for the size of the pancake !!!! I am still going to keep this dispenser and try it at our Shrove Tuesday pancake supper and will still be using the old standard water pitcher. We will be serving about 300 people and I will still be looking for s dispenser that limits the amount of batter, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, very nice. Not brittle or cheaply made. Fits nicely in fridge to store unused mixtures. My only critique is I wish the lid fit a little more snug.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: By far the coolest invention ever.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I dont care if you are a professional chef of you are baking box-mix cupcakes.. you need this in your kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Harris

customer_reviews.title: What a Drip!
customer_reviews.text: The piece that pulls the mechanism back came out and I had to put it back. Not sure if it works because I never used it again. Cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Sass

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: If you accidentally squeeze the dispenser handle to hard it will pop the shut off clap out of guide and will not stop the batter from flowing out. But that was my fault for squeezing the handle to hard. Otherwise I love it, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this. Spigot comes off track easily and spills batter everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: When I used this, the handle that dispenses pancake batter came off the track and my battery spilled all over my stove. There is nothing that keeps this on the track. At the end there is a giant hole where the part readily comes off and spills. Thought I fixed it by putting it back on the track, but the next time I used this the same thing happened. Save your money. Buy something different.
customer_reviews.author: Cioci Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke on second batch
customer_reviews.text: Worked great first time- hand washed it all and second time of use the squeeze part separated from slide;( have to squeeze softly
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Broke first try
customer_reviews.text: This item seemed good so once I put it use it broke on the first try. The bottom part just came off and all my batter came out making such a mess. Not sure if it’d manufactures defects but I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the product. I made pancakes uniformly for about 500 people it was fast and easy. Small note lid does come off easy doesn’t lock into place
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for pancakes
customer_reviews.text: Love this dispenser it's easy to use and dispensees big or small amounts of what ever u put in it great buy
customer_reviews.author: carol davidson

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn’t work. Just adds to clean up. Nice try but actual execution is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do the job
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would be able to buy this and squeeze out pretty pancakes but not at all. My batter doesn’t dispense from this well and it’s a standard pancake batter. I ended up just using a 1/2 cup like I usually do. I won’t be using this at all.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids to assist cooking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, great for kids to assist in making morning pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Van Zant

customer_reviews.title: Thick batter is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble with the batter not coming out consistently due to thickness. Possibly user error on my part but I expected it to work flawlessly because of how great my other OXO products are. Kinda let down but I'll have to try to thin the batter a bit if I can. I was using premix Bisquick batter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used for first time yesterday. Worked great. Performed as advertised. I like the removable rubber valve. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Moore

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good company
customer_reviews.text: Extremely practical not too big not too small can do crapes sauces coolies, just hold it and squeeze it in it’s done!
customer_reviews.author: Simon P.

customer_reviews.title: Precision what?
customer_reviews.text: It leaks and there's nothing "precision" about it, unless you have a calibrated, timed hand.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s be real, kids are messy. This at least makes the breakfast making adventure more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Guess

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: I tried to make some cupcakes, but the batter would not run through. Unless you can make crepes, thus needing a running batter, this dispenser would not work.
customer_reviews.author: Antonietta

customer_reviews.title: Much better than any other Batter Pouring tool I've used.
customer_reviews.text: Other better dispensers or pouring tools I've used rust, fall apart, leak... This one Doesn't!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not good given the usual quality of this brand; the clamp would invariably snap away from the gasket when the slightest bit of extra pressure were applied to the handle, causing spillage; the last straw was when the top attachment just simply cracked off.
customer_reviews.author: KAK

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Makes pancakes easy. Only issue is that towards the end the batter gets thick for some reason. I usually mix it more with a spoon and all is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law for Christmas and she absolutely loves it! She’s used it several times since then and always brags about how great it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Larimer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like at all
customer_reviews.text: Slowly. Very slowly dispensed muffin batter. Cleaned well, extremely difficult to put back together and so disappointed i trashed it. Not worth sending it back as far as a hassle. I had much better hopes. I'll continue the old fashioned way.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mather

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Makes crepe making much easier. Does leak a bit when using. Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Take the mess out of breakfast.
customer_reviews.text: This makes waffle making a much more elegant task. I've tries measuring sppons, cups, pitchers and ended up with fat waffles or skinny ones and lots to clean up. This batter dispenser saves the day!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kathleen Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Lid came broken
customer_reviews.text: Lid cane busted that’s my only complaint other than that it does the job just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the batter is to thick to get through
customer_reviews.author: Envy40

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic, can fall apart while dispersing batter.
customer_reviews.text: Price was good, but the dispensing mechanism can malfunction and fall out of alignment causing an overflow of batter.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Pass

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The handle is very weak and poorly designed. Update: product broke in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: It worked good the first couple of times the the batter didn’t just drip it poured out. Very aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Lasdon

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it 💯💯💯💯
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome.... I love it very useful.... good quality.... easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Huda

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Can’t mix in the dispenser because the silicone tip fills first and can be mixed. The closing mechanisms has detached for me twice while dispensing leading to batter everywhere. Great idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.author: Ebass930

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT! One of the best purchases I ever made! Fast, easy to clean, and makes perfect pancakes every time!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN GIROLAMO

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for crêpes, waffles, pancakes, and even filling cupcake tins
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Easier to pour and less messy!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it pours the pancake batter with precision and it’s less messy than other methods. However, it does not work for thicker batter!
customer_reviews.author: Vanela

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Be careful not to press too hard, latch sprung out off place during use. Great for dispensing in cup cake pan.
customer_reviews.author: Lariza M.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart immediately
customer_reviews.text: I usually like OXO products but this fell apart at first use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: durability and ease of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of cleaning and ease of dispensing, I use it to help me make my Mimi pies.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson J Young

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazingly well!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to make pancakes for family breakfast ! Worked amazingly well!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Kohl

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: Great for baking even cookies, cup cakes, muffins, pancakes, mini quiche or tart fillings.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, holds a full box of cake mix, wonderful for making mess free cupcakes!
customer_reviews.author: victoria macdonald

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for baking many things.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but,the first time I used it it broke .Thankfully I popped it back in place.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Great pancakes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Love this and so easy to use. Makes great pancakes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: The handle that releasing the batter comes apart. This is a poor design.
customer_reviews.text: When using the handle part on the bottom comes apart. We have to reassemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Good for making cupcakes for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to use but....harder to clean. Beats using a bowl
customer_reviews.author: Eric deleon

customer_reviews.title: Pancakes yes, cupcakes no
customer_reviews.text: Does what it was made for but I wanted it for cupcakes more than pancake batter. The thickness of cupcake batter made it take so long to dispense I gave up and just scooped it with a measuring cup like I usually do. Fairly easy to clean but you do have a lot of attachments/parts to take off and put back together. The mechanism works great to stop the flow of batter immediately. Just works too slowly for thicker cake batter. All in all I wouldn't recommend for cake makers but I'm not returning it. It has its uses.
customer_reviews.author: Cheraheath

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this but the first time I squeezed the handle, the piece of plastic that works as the shut off, came out of it's groove. I still tried to use it. Pancake mix was too thick. Had to thin it to almost nothing. Cupcake batter took so long and I had to close the spout manually many times before I gave up and scooped it out with a measuring cup to finish filling them. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not ment for anything thick
customer_reviews.text: So the best thing I like about this is how big the opening and container is. I put my pancake mix and water in it and mix so I dont have to have another bowl. The seal is really great and nothing leaks out. The problem is the opening at the bottom. Depending on the thickness of your batter nothing will come out or barely come out in drops. I end up using a spatula to press the stuff out of just pour it out the top defeating the whole purpose of this thing. If you add a lot of water and your batter is thin it works great.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I tried it on some pancake batter and it did not pour out at all. Granted the batter was kinda thick, but it didn't seem to work well with the rubber nozzle. I ended up having to spoon it out of the dispenser and plop it onto the griddle. Next time I will make a thinner batter, but still this design isn't perfect. I guess I will have to get one of those squeeze bottle dispensers as well. Yay! More crap to store in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and mechanism works smoothly, but you it doesn't work for me with anything even mildly thick. returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was awesome but after having 6 months, it broke
customer_reviews.text: Use for cupcakes & waffles. This was used about once a month, so 6 times. Making cupcakes the last time, it broke, with batter in it. Not fun at all, huge mess, ruined my cupcake count. I normally have no problems with this brand but this dispenser broke on me. The top part oe the handle broke clean off. No way6 to hols batter in until I was able to pinch the rubber at the bottom. I have photos that I took with my phone but Amazon does not allow those types to upload. Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mari D.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but needs work.
customer_reviews.text: Product works but does not take too much effort to over ride the track that holds the stopper. Once it comes undone you get batter everywhere... reordered thinking it was was just this one but in close inspection I was able to duplicate the error with the replacement one..... not very good product unless the track is reworked to not allow the stopper to come off so easy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for making pancakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these to make pancakes for 150 teenagers. They work well. Not adjustable for amount dispensed, but controlled manually by squeezing the handle lever. Much faster than pouring batter. It is a simple design that works well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Overall, does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber membrane is very difficult to take out for cleaning at first. It gets a little easier after you've done it a few times, and get familiar with how it lines up for re-insertion. Don't try to dispense batter with blueberries or any chunky stuff in it. It won't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Jeepster

customer_reviews.title: Check how you are planning on using this...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to replace a cheaper one that I had bought thinking I couldn’t go wrong with Oxxo... reality is, this one only works if you are planning on using all the batter as it doesn’t close well/tight. I usually keep my pancake batter in the fridge for a couple of days and this one doesn’t work as it doesn’t seal...
customer_reviews.author: Eleonora D.

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my money on this. I tried making chocolate cupcakes and didn't want a mess but i squeezed this a drop too hard and it snapped of the track and made a huge mess. Cheaper one I hv works better and is easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea, but the second time I used it the bottom latch that closes the rubber funnel came off and all the pancake mix in the container ended up on the griddle. It was a mess. Poor design. I was able to get it back on after loosing all the contents and then it came off again. A waste of money. Usually OXO is a great company, but this design failed.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and makes pancakes easier to make. It comes apart easy to clean and reassembled easily
customer_reviews.author: Tina osier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this batter dispenser. I previously used a pen like dispenser for the batter which is great for more precise batter dispensing (pancakes using a mould). However, I do really like this dispenser for thicker batters and for storing batter for a later date.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: One of my more useless purchases
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is more trouble than it's worth. The silicone funnel piece gets stuck closed so the batter won't go through it. It is easy to clean, which is a plus, but that's about the best thing I can say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Unique shut off valve doesn't work - Made in China
customer_reviews.text: The valve to shut off the flow of contents does not work. It disconnects with the slightest move of the handle. When it IS in place, it doesn't shut off the flow completely.
customer_reviews.author: K. Demerjian

customer_reviews.title: wonderful idea
customer_reviews.text: Great product that works as advertised. Holds lots of batter and cuts down on the mess when doing lots of pancakes. Easy to use also.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job, but it turns out it is just as easy for me to pour the pancake batter out of the mixing bowl and then have nothing to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JBowl

customer_reviews.title: less mess using this!
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up! Why have I not purchased this before now!!! Easy to clean! Less of a mess using this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but horrible construction
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love the batter dispenser but there is a flaw in the design. If I squeezed it even a little too hard the bottom part would pop off and then batter will just continuously pour out. The lid just sits on the top, so you can’t turn it over to fix the one issue without creating a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B.

customer_reviews.title: Multi pourpose.
customer_reviews.text: I realized I could also use this as a fat separator for making gravies. A lot sturdier than the Blackstone dispenser broke.
customer_reviews.author: J.E. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: this is really nice to use, and easy to clean, but it's not drip proof, but pretty darn close
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang V.

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expect from OXO
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap. The spout does not open enough to allow thicker batters through. The slide mechanism pops off the base. It’s easier to just spoon the batter.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Junk...  Multiple cracks and it quit working after about a month.
customer_reviews.text: Junk... Multiple cracks and it quit working after about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Best Diner in America

customer_reviews.title: Won't dispense thicker batters
customer_reviews.text: Batter needs to be watery or this thing is terrible! Forget about easily dispensing cupcake batter. The idea is good but the reality not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have always been sloppy filling muffin tins and pancakes. This has been a jewel to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Just needs a a little design alteration.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, but it is also easy to dislodge the sliding dispenser cover when you dispense the batter.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie R. Manion

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: If the batter is to thick it’s hard to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for crepe making
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. Perfect for crepe making (and more.) I also use it to fill ice cream Popsicle holders. no mess, no fuss!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Beehler

customer_reviews.title: Quick ,easy storage.
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to make the batter and leaving it in the fridge so I can use the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: A mess
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me. It would not stop pouring.
customer_reviews.author: unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade over previous model.
customer_reviews.text: Much better design that my previous dispenser. The rubber dispenser value closes cleanly and it removes easily for cleaning. Dispenser mechanism seems well made and should hold up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Pa90112

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son in law for Christmas. He used it right away. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Tech0825

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips Precision Batter Dispenser
product_meta.description: Whether you’re making a pancake breakfast, a million mini muffins, or cupcakes for a party, the Precision Batter Dispenser is a precise, easy-to-use solution for less mess. The easy-to-squeeze handle is comfortable to hold, and the shut-off valve provides total control help prevent drips. The top opening is wide for no-fuss filling and the clear, BPA-free body features measurement markings forup to 4 Cups of thin or thick batter. The valve is removable for quick clean-up and the lid doubles as a drip tray between squeezes.
feature_bullets: Precisely dispenses batter for pancakes, cupcakes, crepes and more
Easy-to-squeeze handle and unique, drip-free shut-off valve provide total control
Wide opening for mess-free filling of Batter Dispenser
Convenient measurement markings on BPA-free body up to 4 cups
Lid can be used as a drip tray between squeezes

The OXO Better Guarantee: If you experience an issue with your OXO product, get in touch with us for a repair or replacement. We’re grateful for the opportunity to learn from your experience, and we’ll make it better.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars541 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
